goal.ch:
"本課程的宗旨在啟發學?以定量的?式進?思考。 重點在(I)判斷數據取得?式呈
現了研究對象的那些?向， (II)數據的意義與數據取得?式的關聯， (III)如何解讀
數據以及依據數據進?決策。
因此課程內容主要不在於教導定量分析的技巧， ?在於理解定量分析的?法， 以
利討論與決策的形成。

上課以分組討論?式進?， 並需要輪流上台引導討論。"

outline.ch:
"1. Introduction, assign working groups (1 week):
2. Basic methodology (2 weeks)
Reading:
Carl Sagan 1996 The Fine Art of Baloney Detection. Chapter 12 in Sagan (1996) The Demon-Haunted World
3. Example: modeling (I) (2 weeks)
Reading:
Adrien Friggeri et al. (2014). Rumor Cascades. Proceedings of the Eighth International AAAI Conference on Weblogs and Social Media
4. Correlation and causation: (2 weeks)
Reading:
Robert Matthews (2000) Storks deliver babies (p=0.008). Teaching Statistics 22:36-38
5. Midterm discussions (1 week)
6. Problems of grouping data (2 weeks)
Reading:
https://callingbullshit.org/case_studies/case_study_track_records.html
7. Data visualization (2 weeks)
Reading:
https://callingbullshit.org/tools/tools_misleading_axes.html
https://callingbullshit.org/tools/tools_proportional_ink.htm
8. Thinking about big data (2 weeks)
Reading:
Danah Boyd and Kate Crawford (2011) Six Provocations for Big Data. A Decade in Internet Time: Symposium on the Dynamics of the Internet and Society,
and
David Lazer et al. (2014) The Parable of Google Flu: Traps in Big Data Analysis. Science 343:1203-1205
9. Case study: ranking in higher education, budget of NCU, etc. (2 weeks)
10. Final discussions (1 week)"
